main event: Fishermen observed a luminous body disappearing at an altitude of approximately 2,000 m off the coast of Kunashiri Island in March 1958.
interesting points: The luminous body appeared pale and gradually increased in size,The fishermen were not familiar with clouds or natural phenomena,Three luminous sightings were reported off the Hokkaido coast,An earlier sighting on 31 October 1957 involved a pillar of flame changing color from red to blue,The sightings took place at night and durations were around 10 to 15 minutes.
witness description: Japanese fishermen unfamiliar with clouds and natural phenomena
